getThreadStatsTag().Description: Use @B_android#net#TrafficStats#getThreadStatsTag_E@ directly. Get the active tag used when accounting @B_java#net#Socket_E@ traffic originating from the current thread. Only one active tag per thread is supported. @B_android#support#v4#net#TrafficStatsCompat#tagSocket_E@.

Parameters: int: Number of operations to increment count by.
incrementOperationCount(int).Description: Use @B_android#net#TrafficStats#incrementOperationCount_E@ directly. Increment count of network operations performed under the accounting tag currently active on the calling thread. This can be used to derive bytes-per-operation.

tagDatagramSocket(java.net.DatagramSocke.Description: Tag the given @B_java#net#DatagramSocket_E@ with any statistics parameters active for the current thread. Subsequent calls always replace any existing parameters. When finished, call @B_android#support#v4#net#TrafficStatsCompat#untagDatagramSocket_E@ to remove statistics parameters.

setThreadStatsTag(int).Description: Use @B_android#net#TrafficStats#setThreadStatsTag_E@ directly. Set active tag to use when accounting @B_java#net#Socket_E@ traffic originating from the current thread. Only one active tag per thread is supported. Changes only take effect during subsequent calls to @B_android#support#v4#net#TrafficStatsCompat#tagSocket_E@. Tags between 0xFFFFFF00 and 0xFFFFFFFF are reserved and used internally by system services like DownloadManager when performing traffic on behalf of an application.

incrementOperationCount(int, int).Description: Use @B_android#net#TrafficStats#incrementOperationCount_E@ directly. Increment count of network operations performed under the given accounting tag. This can be used to derive bytes-per-operation.
